items.eaAreaName: Devon, Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly

floodArea.riverOrSea: River Coly, River Yarty, Umborne Brook

items.message:
Flooding is possible overnight tonight and into Thursday morning.  
The heavy and persistent rainfall is expected to continue throughout the night and into Thursday morning. Further scattered showers are forecast throughout the day on Thursday.    
We expect river levels to rise overnight with flooding to low lying land and roads close to the river. 
River levels will remain high throughout Thursday although no flooding to properties is forecast and warnings are not expected to be issued.

Take care near the areas of concern and check your local weather conditions. 
We are constantly monitoring river levels and have staff in the area checking for and clearing blockages in this location. This message will be updated on Thursday morning or earlier if the situation changes.
